title: Avengement
description: Any profit made from this book will be donated to Breast Cancer Research.Sometimes, love is just that little bit too exciting. Mason Fox is angry, very angry. Someone has hurt his sister and in Mason’s world, that is not tolerated. EVER! He’s home and vying for vengeance, but none of them expect just how capable Ava is at distributing avengement for her family, the people who took her in ten years ago and welcomed her as their own. Someone needs to pay and between Ava and Mason, and of course a little help from their friends, it’s all fun and games again.
author: D.H. Sidebottom
